about_the_game:
Circle of Swords is an isometric, party-based fantasy CRPG with a focus on dungeon crawling.

Try it right now with the Free Demo!

  • Tactical Combat: Inspired by the time-tested systems of classic RPGs, I've created a wide variety of spells, status effects, combat abilities, and enemy types that come together to provide an exciting range of combat scenarios.
  • Non-Combat Options: It's not all hack and slash; Adventures are designed to provide a good amount of non-combat approaches as well. Your characters can complement their fighting skills with persuasion, stealth, lockpicking, mind-reading, tracking, athletics, a wide selection of knowledge skills, and much more.
  • Deep Character System: The sheer number of character classes (over 100!) provides an infinite range of build possibilities. With experience your adventurers will unlock additional class slots, allowing near-endless character progression.
  • Buy Once, Free Updates Forever: A onetime purchase entitles you to the whole game and all future updates. This game is a passion project for me and I intend to continue development indefinitely. Also, I don't believe in microtransactions, even for cosmetics.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains fantasy violence, skeletons & bones, display of weapons, harsh language.

short_description: Circle of Swords is a party-based retro RPG by a solo developer. Gather your party, conquer deadly foes, discover powerful artifacts, and survive to tell the tale! Inspired by classics like Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights.
